Name: MetaTube
Overview:
DESCRIPTION
MetaTube downloads video from YouTube and can add metadata from a specified metadata provider on the downloaded file.

NOTES
• There are other variables avialbles that you can use, if needed. Check the GitHub repo to know more.

VERSION
1.0 (2022-02-12)

DEBUG.Name: DEBUG
DEBUG.Description: Whether to enable debug mode or not

LOG.Name: LOG
LOG.Description: Whether to keep logs or not

SOCKET_LOG.Name: SOCKET_LOG
SOCKET_LOG.Description: Whether to log in- and outcoming websocket connections; warning: your console can be spammed with connections.

LOG_LEVEL.Name: LOG_LEVEL
LOG_LEVEL.Description: Numeric value from which MetaTube will keep logs.

Storage (database).Name: Storage (database)
Storage (database).Description: This is the location for the database.

Storage (downloads).Name: Storage (downloads)
Storage (downloads).Description: This is the location for the downloads.
